title: Notes For Paignton/Newquay Zoo MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBs
text: While troubleshooting sync issues for the MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBs MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBsPZOO service - This pulls records from Newquay Zoo to Paignton Zoo. MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBsNZOO service - This pulls records from Paignton Zoo to Newquay Zoo. accChanged Account field flag 0 - Received updated account. 1 - To send updated account record. 5 - Sent updated account record. SELECT * INTO BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB BEGIN TRANSACTION DELETE a FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB a JOIN MStorePZ.dbo.Account b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo WHERE a.accAccNum=b.accAccNum AND a.accName=b.accName AND a.accPrimeContact=b.accPrimeContact AND a.accDateChanged=b.accDateChanged --COMMIT SELECT * FROM MStorePZ.dbo.Account a JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE a SET a.accChanged=1, a.accDateChanged=GETDATE() FROM MStorePZ.dbo.Account a JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo WHERE a.accAccNum=b.accAccNum AND a.accName=b.accName AND a.accPrimeContact=b.accPrimeContact AND a.accDateChanged=b.accDateChanged COMMIT SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.Account a JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.Account a JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 a JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo
description:
While troubleshooting sync issues for the MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBs 


MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBsPZOO service - This pulls records from Newquay Zoo to Paignton Zoo.

MeracCopyMembersAcrossDBsNZOO service - This pulls records from Paignton Zoo to Newquay Zoo.


accChanged Account field flag

0 - Received updated account.

1 - To send updated account record.

5 - Sent updated account record.


SELECT * INTO BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB

BEGIN TRANSACTION 
DELETE a
FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB a
JOIN MStorePZ.dbo.Account b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo
WHERE a.accAccNum=b.accAccNum AND a.accName=b.accName AND a.accPrimeContact=b.accPrimeContact AND a.accDateChanged=b.accDateChanged
--COMMIT 

SELECT * FROM MStorePZ.dbo.Account a
JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo

BEGIN TRANSACTION 
UPDATE a
SET a.accChanged=1, a.accDateChanged=GETDATE()
FROM MStorePZ.dbo.Account a
JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo
WHERE a.accAccNum=b.accAccNum AND a.accName=b.accName AND a.accPrimeContact=b.accPrimeContact AND a.accDateChanged=b.accDateChanged
COMMIT

SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.Account a
JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo

SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB

SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.Account a
JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo

SELECT * FROM MStoreNZ.dbo.BAKAccountToSyncPZOODB29Jan2025 a
JOIN MStoreNZ.dbo.AccountToSyncPZOODB b ON a.accRecNo=b.accRecNo
